mapper.insert: insert into board_info(board_number, board_cate_number, subject, user_id, content) values(seq_board.nextval, 10, #{subject}, #{user_id}, #{content})
mapper.select:
select * from(select rownum rnum, a.* from(select b.board_number, b.reply_count, b.subject, b.reg_date, b.view_count, u.user_nick from board_info b, user_info u where b.user_id = u.user_id and is_del != 'Y'
order by board_number desc)a) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
mapper.update: update board_info set reply_count = (select count(*) from reply_info where board_number = #{board_number}) where board_number = #{board_number}
mapper.insert: insert into board_file(file_path, board_number) values (#{file_path}, seq_board.currval)
